channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Sioe 2025
channel.desc: Ymunwch ? Ifan Jones Evans a Mari Lovgreen am uchafbwyntiau diwrnod cyntaf y Sioe Fawr. Join Ifan Jones Evans and Mari Lovgreen for the highlights from the first day at the Royal Welsh Show.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ralio
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau wythfed rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o Tartu, Estonia. Rali sy'n gyfuniad o bethau! Highlights of the eighth round of the World Rally Championship from Tartu, Estonia.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gronyn Gobaith
channel.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Sioe 2025
channel.desc: Ymunwch ? Ifan Jones Evans a Mari Lovgreen am uchafbwyntiau diwrnod cyntaf y Sioe Fawr. Join Ifan Jones Evans and Mari Lovgreen for the highlights from the first day at the Royal Welsh Show.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Home Shopping.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
channel.desc: programmes start at 6.00am.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Tralalas
channel.desc: 'Da chi wedi dychmygu beth sydd o dan y don? Dewch ar antur gyda Harmoni, Melodi a Bop i weld yr holl greaduriaid anhygoel sy'n byw yno. Have you ever wondered what's under the sea.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam T?n
channel.desc: Mae Norman yn ffilmio ffilm ysb?wr a fe yw Jac Pond - mae Sam Tan a'i griw wrth gefn! Norman is filming the \"best ever\" spy film and he is Jac Pond. Sam Tan and his crew are on standby.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cacamwnci
channel.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, j?cs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sion y Chef
channel.desc: Mae Sid Singh yn mynd ?'r plant ar drip natur, ond aiff pethau'n draed moch pan mae Mario'n codi ofn ar y merlod mynydd. Sid Singh takes the children on a nature trip, but things go wrong.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Asra
channel.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Llanbrynmair yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Llanbrynmair visit Asra this week.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caru Canu
channel.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol i suo plant bach i gysgu yw \"Si Hei Lwli\". \"Si Hei Lwli\" is a traditional nursery rhyme which helps children to fall asleep.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Digbi Draig
channel.desc: Mae Betsi'n gadael ei hylif swyn dan ofal Digbi a Cochyn wrth iddi hi fynd i chwilio am y cynhwysyn olaf. Betsi leaves Digbi and Cochyn looking after a magic potion. That's a mistake.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bendibwmbwls
channel.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Beca to create excellent treasure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Wedi i Benja ddod o hyd i feillionen, mae Guto'n chwarae triciau arno i'w gael i gredu ei bod yn lwcus. When Benja finds a four-leaf clover, Guto tricks him saying it brings good luck.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
channel.desc: Ysgol Y Fenni sy'n ymuno ? Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Fenni join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cywion Bach
channel.desc: C?t law, c?t dwym, c?t tedi. Ie,'c?t' yw gair heddiw. Dere ar antur geiriau gyda'r Cywion Bach wrth iddyn nhw - a ti - ddysgu'r gair 'c?t'. We learn about the word 'c?t' (coat).

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Deian a Loli
channel.desc: Mae'r efeilliaid yn mwynhau helfa drysor ond mae nhw'n cael trafferth ar y cwestiwn ola', a tydi Dad yn ddim llawer o help! Deian and Loli enjoy a treasure hunt but run into some trouble.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Wrth i grwbanod m?r newydd-anedig anelu am y cefnfor, mae'n rhaid i'r Octonots eu hamddiffyn rhag ysglyfaethwyr. As newborn baby sea turtles scuttle to the ocean they need help to stay safe.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Betsan eisiau gwybod mwy am asparagws, felly mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn ei thywys i Fferm Fach i ddangos iddi sut mae'n cael ei dyfu. Betsan wants to discover more about asparagus.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Oi! Osgar
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Carlamu
channel.desc: Cyfres newydd yn dilyn rhai o blant Cymru sy'n caru ceffylau. Gwelwn y berthynas, yr ymroddiad, y siom a'r llawenydd sy'n ran o farchogaeth. New series following kids who love horses.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
channel.desc: Mae Gu'n ennill g?m-fwrdd ar ddamwain fel gwobr Bingo ond does neb wedi ei chwarae ers blynyddoedd ac mae'r g?m nawr eisiau dial! Gran accidentally wins a board game but things turn odd.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Smyrffs
channel.desc: Mae'n Galan Gaeaf ac mae Ofnus yn cael ei droi yn anghenfil sy'n anfwriadol greu hafoc i'r Smyrffs. On Halloween, Ofnus finds himself turned into a monster that inadvertently wreaks havoc.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cyfres Triathlon Cymru
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau ail gymal Cyfres Triathlon Cymru a ras sbrint eiconig Llanc y Llechi yn Eryri. Highlights of the second leg of the Cymru Triathlon Series and the iconic Llanc y Llechi sprint.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno o'r Sioe
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau g?m y Brodorion/Pasifika v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig, a chwaraewyd yn gynharach. Highlights of the First Nations & Pasifika XV v The British & Irish Lions, played earlier.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SEICLO
channel.desc: Cymal 16 - Uchafbwyntiau'r dydd o'r Tour de France. Stage 16 - The day's highlights from the Tour de France.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
channel.desc: Siaradwn ? dwy wnaeth brofi casineb tuag at fenywod ac ymddygiad amhriodol tra'n gweithio i'r heddlu. We talk to victims who experienced misogyny whilst working in Welsh police forces.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
channel.desc: Elin Fflur sy'n sgwrsio dan olau'r lloer ym Mwynder Maldwyn gyda'r hyfryd Mari Lovgreen. In tonight's episode Elin Fflur chats with the lovely Mari Lovgreen.
